item.description:
We are hosting our very first exclusive pug meet-up group! Our indoor playroom is open for little pugs to come and meet other little puglets. If you are looking to socialize your pug and meet other friendly dog owners....come visit Best Friends on March 27th. Please provide up to date vaccines if it your first visit with us.

There is no charge for this meet-up, however we are accepting donations to help raise money to build our very own dog park in Rocky Hill, Best Friends will match all donations!

Organized by Samantha, hosted by Best Friends.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Welcome Pugs!
